HiddenText.Name: CE Quest fall Q2
HiddenText.OpenningText: How does Quest differ from a standard on-campus semester?
HiddenText.BodyCopy: Programs focus on hands-on or experiential education. The small number of participants (about 30 in each program) provides greater individualized attention for each student. This environment also fosters great opportunities to grow and develop socially and academically and is a hallmark of all Quest programs. In addition, presentation of coursework is greatly augmented by the strengths of the area and location of the given program.
